message.raw:
Remove tests for out-of-range color alpha

This behavior has changed between gazebo::Color and ignition::math::Color.
If these tests should be anywhere, it's in ignition math. However, the tests
expect an invalid color to be unmodified. ignition::math::Color checks for
invalid colors (alpha < 0 or alpha > 1) and clamps them.
